changelog:
Syberia OS updated!

Changelog:
new:
- expanded desktop
- launcher: rework, new gestures, Google search bar etc ..
- recents icon pack support
- less notifications sounds
- show battery temperature in battery settings
- 4G instead of LTE statusbar option

fixed:
- autobrightness QS icon on light theme
- notification ticker overlapping with center clock
- launcher: swipe down gesture works over icons and custom widgets, fixed false positive QS panel opening
- qs opacity after reboot

Improvements:
- memory optimization (CAF)
- Updated ims.apk from Whyred
- Updated qti-telephony-common.jar to Pie from Mi A2 jasmine
- systemui theming
- update translations
- Battery usage prediction from Google health service

Kernel:
- EAS improvements
